name: @adobe/commerce-cif-web-action-transformer
description: Adobe Commerce Integration Framework (CIF) Web Action Transformer Project
author: Adobe Systems Inc.

scripts.deploy-latest: wsk -i package create web-action-transformer@latest --shared yes; npm run deploy -- --ow-package web-action-transformer@latest
scripts.deploy-current: wsk -i package create web-action-transformer@$npm_package_version --shared yes; npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-suffix: wsk -i package create web-action-transformer@${OW_PACKAGE_SUFFIX} --shared yes; npm run deploy -- --ow-package web-action-transformer@${OW_PACKAGE_SUFFIX}
scripts.remove-latest: npm run remove -- --ow-package web-action-transformer@latest; wsk -i package delete web-action-transformer@$npm_package_version
scripts.remove-current: npm run remove; wsk -i package delete web-action-transformer@latest
scripts.remove-suffix: npm run remove -- --ow-package web-action-transformer@${OW_PACKAGE_SUFFIX}; wsk -i package delete web-action-transformer@${OW_PACKAGE_SUFFIX}
scripts.deploy-package: npm run deploy-current; npm run deploy-latest
scripts.remove-package: npm run remove-current; npm run remove-latest
